div.a: NY State of Health Letter to Families (click here)
eLearning Guidance Document: Extended Closure Expectations:Revised 4/16/20 (click here)

span.style: background-color: #ffffff; color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 17px

span.span: Meals will be available for pick up at the school again in the back of the school on Friday from 9-11am and again from 4-6pm. We will be using new social distancing protocols which include the adult driving around the bus loop, pulling up near the first set of tables, parking, and taking the meal bags off the table and loading into your own car. We will identify your family so we know how many meals you will need and place those bags on the front tables where you can retrieve them and drive on. This will be done one vehicle at a time, so please wait until the first car has moved on. Thank you in advance.

p.style: color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; background-color: #ffffff; font-size: 17px

span.p: Remember WiFi is available in our parking lot for students to zoom and download and upload assignments. Please stay in your vehicles in order to practice the expected social distancing.

p.style: color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; background-color: #ffffff; font-size: 17px

span.p: Reminder of our schedule: School is closed through April 14 (Delaware County Public Health announcement). We are expecting students to interact with their teachers as has been established. Students in grades 5-12 must check their google mail and classrooms. April 6-13 is VACATION no class work will be required during this break. We WILL have meals available on April 10.

br.span:
Please make sure your children in grades 5-12 are checking their google classroom applications for course assignments and checking email for communication from school staff.
The district has set up network access from the parking lot. It is available for your child to download any new assignments and upload completed ones so you don’t have to use your data for that part. Please call the school for the network name and password. A robo call was sent with this information on Tuesday evening after 5pm.
If your child is having technical difficulties signing into google accounts or something of this nature, please feel free to call our tech help desk for support at (607)766-3800.

div.style: float:left; width:100%; border:2px solid black; height:320px;

br.span: The mission of South Kortright Central School is to aggressively provide all students, in an environment that is caring and challenging, the diversity of experiences to gain the skills and attitudes necessary for the lifetime acquisition of knowledge, aesthetics and ethics. These experiences will ensure the best quality of life for the students and their community. This mission will be fulfilled by an empowered school and community working together to develop and continually assess an educational program which utilizes a wide variety of learning strategies, experiences and support services to enable our students to be productive, contributing members of society.

div.span:
South Kortright Central School:
58200 State Highway 10, South Kortright, NY
Phone: 607-538-9111 | Fax: 607-538-9205
